Package ohos.agp.animation

Class AnimatorScatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.AnimatorScatter

  • public class AnimatorScatter
extends Object
    Parses the animation XML layout file to obtain an Animator object.

    The AnimatorScatter object parses animation attributes, reads the attribute values, and sets them for the Animator object, such as AnimatorValue and AnimatorProperty.

    Since:
    3

      • getInstance

        public static AnimatorScatter getInstance​(Context context)
        Obtains an AnimatorScatter instance.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        Returns:

        Since:

      • parse

        public Animator parse​(int xmlId)
        Parses the XML file to obtain the Animator object in the layout.

        This method parses the resource ID of the XML file and then reads the attributes to obtain the Animator object.

        Parameters:
        xmlId - Indicates the resource ID of the XML file.
        Returns:
        Returns the Animator object.
        Since:
        3
